sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import '../styles/tour-details.css' import { Container,Row,Col,Form,ListGroup } from 'reactstrap' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import tourData from '../assets/data/tours' import calculateAvgRating from '../utils/avgRating' const TourDetails = () => { const {id }= useParams() //this is an static data for API N Data base const tour= tourData.find(tour=> tour.id===id ) const{photo,title,desc,price,reviews,address,city,distance,maxGroupSize} = tour ; const{totalRating,avgRating}=calculateAvgRating(reviews) return <>

{title}

{calculateAvgRating=== 0 ? null : avgRating} {totalRating === 0 ? ("Not rated") : ( ({reviews.length}) )}
} export default TourDetails
